text:
Hey George, it looks like this information isnt currently available in any of our APIs, can you add this to the ideas board in the community then paste a link back here for others to jump in and upvote if they feel like it would good for them as well?

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/idb-p/HubSpot_Ideas>
Would it be better to find all the templates/pages that depend on the menu?
You would have to write a script to get dependencies for each template individually through the API, we donâ€™t have an export job ATM for this information
:bulb:A version of content staging on the actual production domain with https, maybe with a query string parameter to indicate the staged version.
(This would help a lot testing interaction with endpoints that might be whitelisting domains and surface any problems with protocol discrepancies, before pushing to production)
